home_page.commitment_description1: We built the website to be user friendly but most importantly we never compromise on securities matter. All the information provided are encrypted to ensure the security and privacy of your data and we will never share it or sell it to any third parties.
home_page.commitment_description2: We offer a variety of secure, easy and fast payment gateway options for deposit and withdrawal. We have one of the fastest transaction process in payouts and withdrawal as we constantly trying to reduce the transaction period to maximize fun times.

detail1modal.description1: 1). All Uwin33 New Members are entitled to claim this Slots Starter Pack Bonus during their first time deposit.
detail1modal.description11: 2). To qualify, member are required to make a minimum deposit of SGD50 or above and select Slots Starter Pack when submit DEPOSIT FORM.
detail1modal.description21: 1) The promotion will be officially starting on 10 May 2022.
detail1modal.description22: 2) In order to join this event, you are required to make deposit at least SGD 100 or above during event period to obtain Draw Ticket.
detail1modal.description23: 3) You are required to click the button below and send us "I'm Interested" to participate in this event. Once we received your message, you are considered as joining the event.
detail1modal.description24: 4) For more info about the event winner rewards, refer to table below:-
detail1modal.description25: 5) You will earn Draw Ticket by accumalate your total deposit by minimum of SGD100 during event period. More info refer to table shown below:
detail1modal.description26: 6) All Draw Tickets will be combined and draw by the system randomly to get winner after the event ends. The winners list will be announced in rank of Top 1 - 100 upon event ends.
detail1modal.description27: 7) For winners that received reward of Bonus, you are required to make a bet amount of at least 1 time before withdrawal can be made.
detail1modal.description28: 8) Exclusions of the Turnover/Real Bet calculation:-

detail2modal.description1: 1.All Uwin33 Members are entitled to claim this Slots & Live Casino 6% Weekly CASHBACK promotion.
detail2modal.description2: 2.To qualify, member is required to made a successful deposit and joined at least 7 days or above with Uwin33. ( 7 days duration is based on date of first deposit completed )

detail2modal.description21: 1. This promotion is based on weekly basis. Monday to Sunday is considered as one (1) week.
detail2modal.description22: 2. You are required to make a bet amount of at least 10 times before withdrawal can be made. ( Total Real Bet 10 times of Bonus ).
detail2modal.description221:

Cash Back Bonus = SGD50
Required Bet Amount = SGD50 x 10 = SGD500
detail2modal.description23: 3. The maximum payout for this bonus is SGD 1,688.
detail2modal.description24: 4. The bonus amount will be credited into member’s account main wallet automatically each Monday.
detail2modal.description25: 5. This special bonus cannot be used in conjunction with any other bonuses offer.
detail2modal.description26: 6. Weekly Cash Back will start calculate starting on 2nd week after new member made first deposit.

tc_popup.description1: 1. Who are eligible to join "MILLIONS SUBSIDY PRIZE POOL UP TO SGD1,000,000" ?
tc_popup.description11: All UWIN33 Members under Singapore site is entitled to participate in this event and have a chance to claim the bonus up to SGD1688.
tc_popup.description12: This event will be launching until further notice.
tc_popup.description21: You are required to make deposit and play any game except RNG, Arcade & Electronic Games under Spade Gaming Slot in UWIN33.
tc_popup.description22: There's no minimum bet amount required in this event.
tc_popup.description31: Member may claim this 10% Subsidy up to SGD1,688 based on their successful withdrawal amount within the event day.
tc_popup.description32: Member are required to claim this bonus from Livechat on the same day of withdrawal completed or it will be considered as expired.
tc_popup.description33: In order to claim this bonus, the successful withdrawal amount must be higher than last deposit amount.
tc_popup.description34: To qualify, the withdrawal requires to have highest winning under Spade Gaming Slot.
tc_popup.description35: The SGD1,000,000 Prize Pool will be deduct based on member claimed record and will auto reset back to the SGD1,000,000 on every 1st of the month.
tc_popup.description36: Each member entitled to claim this bonus ONCE per day.
tc_popup.description37: The winners list and Prize Pool balance will be updated daily at 12PM (GMT+8).
tc_popup.description38: You are required to make a bet amount of at least x1 turnover of the bonus before withdrawal can be made.
tc_popup.description39:
Calculations:
Extra Reward Bonus = SGD1,688
Required Bet Amount = SGD1,688 x 1 = SGD1,688
tc_popup.description310: Exclusions of the bonus turnover calculation: -
tc_popup.description314: Bet more than 24 numbers within ONE (1) round/ match in Roulette games
tc_popup.description315: Bet placed containing selection of odds less than 0.5 or 1.50 ( Decimal Odds )
tc_popup.description320: Note: 918Kiss, 918Kaya and Mega888 Non-Slots Games including Arcade, Table Card Games (Electronic & Live Casino) are not allowed to play with this bonus claimed, once found winning will be forfeited.
tc_popup.description4: 4. UWIN33 RESERVED THE RIGHTS TO MODIFY THE EVENT TERMS OR CANCEL THIS EVENT AT ANY TIME, EITHER AIMING AT ALL PLAYERS OR INDIVIDUAL PLAYERS.
tc_popup.description5: 5. ALL UWIN33 GENERAL TERMS & CONDITIONS APPLY.

deposit_page.deposit_fail_2: Insufficient balance in main wallet for deposit.
deposit_page.Reminder1: - Member can either scan the QR code or copy the Address to start the transaction.
deposit_page.Reminder2: - Every member has their own unique Deposit Address for Crypto. When the above address receives Crypto, it will automatically credit into your UWIN33 Main Wallet Balance.
deposit_page.Reminder3: - The Exchange Rate is indicative. The actual rate and amount credited can only be determined after submission of the transaction.
deposit_page.Reminder4: - Member need to login to their own respective Crypto Currency account and make the transfer (same as interbank transfer), send Crypto only to the respective Deposit Address shown in our deposit page, and make sure you select the correct network.
deposit_page.Reminder5: - Sending Crypto to wrong address or wrong network may result in the loss of your deposit and UWIN33 will not take any responsibility for this.
deposit_page.Reminder6: - Credit will automatically credited into your wallet after the transaction is confirmed. Normally it takes 5-10 minutes to reflect in your Main Wallet Balance.
deposit_page.Reminder7: - Deposit through Crypto will not entitled for any Welcome Bonus and Daily Deposit Bonus.
deposit_page.Reminder8: - UWIN33 will not bears any transaction fees.
deposit_page.Network_help: *Please make sure you select the same deposit and withdrawal network, or your assets may be lost, UWIN33 will not bears any loss.

megajackpot_page.title: 如何增加 超级大奖?
megajackpot_page.description: 每位新参与者加入将在奖池中增加 MYR 1,000，现在邀请您的朋友参加此活动一起赢取 超级大奖！

tickets_page.title:
预测票
不足
tickets_page.description: 最低存款 MYR30即可获得一张预测票

thank_you_page.title: 谢谢 您！
thank_you_page.description: MYR30 将在1分钟内存入您的电子钱包

home_page.How_to_Play1: 最低存款 MYR30 可获得 1 张预测票（每天最多可获得 1 张预测票）
home_page.How_to_Play2: 使用1张票进入预测游戏，每天通过特定的匹配项预测全日制结果（ 8 个问题）
home_page.How_to_Play3: 正确预测 4-8 个结果以赢取免费现金奖励
home_page.How_to_Play4: 于 2022 年世界杯期期间，您必须累积并正确预测 8 个结果中的 3 个才能赢得 MYR1,000,000 的超级大奖
home_page.How_to_Play5: 想要增加 超级大奖 金额？ 邀请你的朋友参加此活动！ 每位新参与者将在奖池中增加 MYR 1,000
home_page.Terms_Conditions1: A Terms and Conditions agreement is where you let the public know the terms, rules and guidelines for using your website or mobile app. They include topics such as acceptable use, restricted behavior and limitations of liability.
home_page.Terms_Conditions2: This article will get you started with creating your own custom Terms and Conditions agreement. We've also put together a Sample Terms and Conditions Template that you can use to help you write your own.
home_page.Mega_jackpot11: - Accumulate 3 correct predictions of 8 results during the World Cup 2022 to win Mega Jackpot of MYR1,000,000
home_page.Mega_jackpot12: - If there are multiple winners, the top 3 will share the prize pool (based on the number of correctly predict results)
home_page.Mega_jackpot2: Every new participant will add MYR 1,000 to the prize pool, invite your friends join the event and win the MEGA JACKPOT together!
home_page.Mega_jackpot3: Payout. Prizes are paid out in USDT only.

home_page.How_to_Play2: 排行榜的排名取决于体育产品的总投注额
home_page.How_to_Play3: 传奇排行榜中分别有2个排行榜（传奇，大师），并享有不同的奖金份额
home_page.How_to_Play4: 追逐更高的排名以赢取高达 MYR 300,000 或更多
home_page.How_to_Play5: 想要增加奖金池的金额？ 立即邀请您的朋友参加此活动！ 每位新参与者将在奖池中增加 MYR200
